whoCan.title: This masterclass is for
whoCan.para1: Data Scientist aspirants who are aiming to accelerate their respective careers by upskilling with Data Science.
whoCan.para2: Professionals, irrespective of their domains, who have great enthusiasm to make a career transition into Data Science.
whoCan.para3: Learnbay Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.
